request.description: This API will return a list of the acitve insurance companies
This API will return a list of the acitve delviery cities
This API will return a list of the acitve pick up cities
This API will return a list of the acitve delviery districts
This API will return a list of the acitve Pick Up districts

This API will return a list of the acitve Pick Up Stores. You either can filter by City or by City+District. or by gps
inscase you seache by gps then City and District Paramters will be ignored and a list of pharmacies will return maximum 20 store within 20KM from GPS location

item.name: Get Delivery Slots List By Delivery Store Code

request.description: This API will return a list delivery slots dpending on the selected dleivery store (the dleivery store will comes from dleivery city+delviery district compination)
